name: solarys-fraud-detection-demo
description: Multi-agent fraud detection demo using Claude and Gemini over MCP and A2A protocols

scripts.dev:demo: concurrently -n mcp,detect,invest,api,web -c blue,cyan,green,yellow,magenta "npm run dev --workspace=@solarys/mcp-server" "npm run dev:fraud-detection --workspace=@solarys/agents" "npm run dev:claims-investigation --workspace=@solarys/agents" "npm run dev --workspace=@solarys/api" "npm run dev --workspace=@solarys/web"
